entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
